snippet: Village Ways is offering new trips to tiger reserves in India that are believed to be the setting for tales in Rudyard Kipling’s “Jungle Book.”
abstract: Village Ways is offering new trips to tiger reserves in India that are believed to be the setting for tales in Rudyard Kipling’s “Jungle Book.”
lead_paragraph: Although the newest “Jungle Book” movie adaptation isn’t due in theaters until the fall, one outfitter is offering jungle excursions in the Indian wilderness that inspired  Rudyard Kipling’s original 1894 story.

headline.main: A New Trip to See Tigers in India
